response.overview: Chen Daming, a self-proclaimed "ordinary guy" with average looks and income, questions his sexuality after years of romantic drought. With help from misguided pals, he awkwardly explores queerness—only to stumble into workplace success by embracing his accidental "straightness". But when a fujoshi boss crashes his identity crisis, sparking real attraction, his life spirals into chaos: Should he stay poker-straight? Lean into queerness? Pursue forbidden office romance? As slapstick soul-searching collides with corporate absurdity, Chen discovers that labels crumble where empathy, courage, and messy human connections begin.
response.title: Straight Man
